name: La Cocina de Mama
address: 154 E 109th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

reviews.text: Nice staff and good food. I recommend ‚ò∫Ô∏è
One of my favorite places for Taco and quesadilla.
Cuisine tr√®s bonne mais tr√®s √©pic√© üå∂Ô∏è !!

Corn flour is hand processed into tortillas or tlacoyos. Carnitas are nicely cooked and balanced with different pieces of pork. Horchata is natural and home made. Bonus for having Boing (Mexican pulp beverages)

Very Delicious Food
Very Friendly  Service
5 Stars Hi Recomend üëåüíØ

Hands down the best cantina style Mexican food in Harlem! No frills, just rustic, authentic eats, the way it should be! The owner always welcomes guests with a loving motherly attitude, the space is well kept & clean and it's very easy to settle in for a satisfying meal. I've had a variety of tacos, burritos & tortas and have never left disappointed!
Pricy(Dry Birrias tacos and Salty) not recommended.
Paid $16.33 for 3 steak tacos. The meat was bland. Not worth it.
Literally the worst burrito ive ever had in my life. So dry. No taste. And so expensive. The tres leches wasn‚Äôt that bad. But the actual food was terrible. I would never recommend to anyone
Even tho the torta was really good, it was really small and I got taxed a bit, meh spot
Great service, great food
I highly recommend this restaurant. The guacamole and queso is some of the best around. The servers were also super friendly and helpful.
Incredibly good food. The elote (street corn) was marvelous. So friendly, too!
Ven te lo recomiendo

The lamb quesadilla was lacking a bit of flavor, perhaps adding tomato or more seasoning would help. The torta also lacked any distinct bold flavor aside from the jalapenos. Other than that the food was alright and service was great.
Delicious food, quickly done  and fairly priced

Extraordinary Mexican food for New York.  I had carnitas tacos and was very pleased.  Then I spoke to the lady who cooks (I assume the owner) and learned she is from Mexico City, which explains why the food is so good and authentic (she adds a secret ingredient to make the carnitas richer).  This place is very small with only a counter for eating in.  We were served by a very friendly and accommodating young man.  My wife was pleased with her enchiladas verdes.  Next time I'll try the barbacoa.
Las gorditas de chicharr√≥n perfecto
hit or miss and a little pricey but good service and a cute atmosphere.
The food has good taste but the carnita has too much fat and one or two little bones.  Good portions

You can‚Äôt go wrong here. I live in the neighborhood and eat a couple times a week. Food is fantastic, and the chicken tinga quesadilla is world class. Service is great too. Support this great East Harlem family-owned business!
Very good restaurant! I recommend
Had the birria tacos and they were delicious!! Can‚Äôt wait to come back again and again
I love eating here. The food and service is great.
This place is a very warm, friendly, and welcoming restaurant. The food is definitely worth the price and I would personally recommend the Quesadillas.
The food was excellent I really enjoyed it,The service was really fast I recommend it 10/10

Petit restaurant tr√®s chaleureux avec une ambiance mexicaine
nachos au poulet, tacos aux crevettes excellent
Personnel sympathique et disponible
This place overcharges regularly. It was supposed to be $10.88 with tax and I was charged $11.98. Their portion sizes have gotten a lot smaller too. Rip off.

This is a family restaurant, the staff are very friendly, they play good music, they always are welcoming. The place is neat!

Happy Halloween blippi

Small restaurant with just seating at the bar. Excellent food. Excellent service. Highly recommend.
Lots of delicious options!  Affordable as well/

I needed a quick lunch, so I tried this place. I had a chorizo taco and a tinga de pollo quesadilla. The taco was awesome! The sausage was cut into tiny cubes and grilled, not soaked in oil and grease like some places. And the tinga was excellent, not dry, and had that great tangy flavor I love. Everything was fresh, and the prices were very reasonable. If I'm in the neighborhood again, I'll definitely go back.

Don‚Äôt pay attention to the bad reviews. It‚Äôs just people without tastebuds or people who just had a bad experience, we are humans and don‚Äôt always feel 100%!!!! Don‚Äôt judge it until you give it another try if you didn‚Äôt like it. Because I LOVED it. The tings quesadilla is definitely one of my favorites.

probably  sone of the best Mexican food I‚Äôve had in nyc . Pls don‚Äôt shit on East Harlem Mexican food bc this spot slapped . The spot is small with Bench like seating and the people running the spot were so kind and attentive . The fist and al pastor tacos were amazing . Al pastor tacos usually don‚Äôt have the right seasoning but this one was perfect . The fish taco has a good amount of fish and seasoned well . We also had the sope . Definitely coming back and glad this place is in my neighborhood .
Pedi unas quesadillas me llegaron frias peroo estaban ricas..si ellos le dijeran a los clientes q tienen de especiales como el pozole y otras cosas mas estaria muy bien ambiente tranquilo para comer
To hot the place no AC
When you search for ‚Äúbest tres leches cake‚Äù on Google this is the place that comes up. My wife and I schlepped a mile to get just the cake and it‚Äôs seriously amazing.

Es triste como se vende la comida mexicana  tan exagerada mente cara y ni siquiera sabe buena ped√≠ unos tacos dorados y literalmente solo eran 4 tacos con lechuga y queso no tra√≠an ni frijoles $14 d√≥lares una gorda de chicharr√≥n que estaba‚Ä¶
La qualitat-preu del que serveixen √©s excelent. Els dos plats que vam provar estaven molt bons. El local √©s petit, per√≤ s'hi pot menjar c√≤modament. El servei molt agradable.

Birria tacos, fresh corn chips and queso. All 3 were incredible. Food came in less than 10 minutes after ordering and the guy behind the counter was doing it all. I‚Äôve never left a review before and I had to after this. Cant wait to go back every day I‚Äôm here.

Tout petit restaurant avec cuisine typique mexicaine. √âquipe souriante et sympathique. On a command√© les burritos aux l√©gumes (tr√®s bons) et les quasadillas au poulet (excellents). N'h√©sitez pas √† go√ªter leurs sodas et boissons typiques. Une petite p√©pite dans Harlem.
D√©licieux

Cozy little Mexican restaurant in East Harlem. Close to the train. Al pastor tacos were great and bistec tortas were flavorful. Fresh hibiscus and taminars drinks were perfect for summer. Staff are super nice. Planning to go back to try more off the menu. Highly recommend!
Delicious tacos + super friendly staff. Forgot my bag and the man working there ran for a block after us to bring it back to us. Most people wouldn‚Äôt do that!
Love the street cornüòúand nachos‚Ä¶
Best Mexican experience ever!

Wow, this is one of my favorite Mexican food places ever. The owner is so kind she reminds me of such a loving mother. The food is as wonderful as her. So flavorful and so yummy I usually get the torta or the mom rice bowls. They are just so delicious really should keep this place, but it is just so amazing. It‚Äôs a small cozy place, but so worth the travel all the way uptown really would recommend!!

Vivo en la Ciudad de M√©xico y vengo muy seguido a los Estados Unidos, encontrar buena comida mexicana siempre ha sido muy dif√≠cil hasta que llegu√© aqu√≠, ufffff prob√© los tacos y estaban buen√≠simo s pero lo que nos vol√≥ la cabeza a mi esposa y a mi fue la hamburguesa con huitlacoche ü§§ una verdadera maravilla ya queremos regresar y comerlas de nuevo, felicidades a Juan y a su familia que lo apoyan en este proyecto

Absolutely best Mexican food I‚Äôve had! Delicious, fresh, handmade tortillas. Tasteful fun music and decor. Small, but omg WORTH IT! I had sopes, elote and my husband had al pastor tacos. ‚Äî Mexican traveler from Arizona!!
Lo.mejor.de lo.mejor

I've only been here twice but everything has been great here. I got tacos (shrimp, carnitas and chorizo) and chips with salsa & guacamole - all excellent!

It is a small space so I would not recommend it for large groups (over 10 people at a time), but great space otherwise. The bathroom is also small but very clean and neat.

Super rica y deliciosa üòã comida.
El servicio fue incre√≠blemente r√°pido, atento, alegre y amistoso.

El local esta limpio y organizado,  el ba√±o tiene una decoraci√≥n de plantas muy padres.

Los precios son razonables.

1000/10! Stumbled upon this place looking for a bite to eat and it was probably the best Mexican food I‚Äôve ever had. Would definitely always recommend. Restaurant was very clean and the staff were super friendly. Prices were fair, too.

BEST MEXICAN FOOD in NYC! Authentic flavor and wonderful service. Extensive menu and they are very flexible with orders (I ask for a Birria burrito every time (not on the menu) and they‚Äôre always happy to accommodate!) Give this small business a try, you will not regret it!!!

Muy rico todo.

Mi hamburguesa con huitlacoche ten√≠a un sabor √∫nico, toda la comida es fresca; incluyendo las patatas fritas.

Me queda lejos de casa, si no vendr√≠a al menos 4 veces al mes.
Might be best tacos in Manhattan. So far had Al pastor, fish and barbacoa and it‚Äôs all amazing. Everything fresh and great quality and the taste only has you wishing you ordered more!

I ordered two steak quesadillas for take out. I‚Äôm highly disappointed to see that there was only a little bit of meat on both. They were very stingy with the meat, just little pieces of it. Im literally having bites of Lettuce and cheese, barely any meat on it. The ‚Äú meals‚Äù were just about $20. It was a waste of money, where I could have gotten more for it.

I gave 2 stars because it tasted good but barely any meat.
Delicious fresh food! At fair prices. I had the steak Torta with salsa verde and was very pleased. Strongly recommend!

Incredible!! I happened to be in East Harlem, walked past La Cocina de Mama, and, on a whim, went in for a quick bite. It was honestly so random, but I‚Äôm definitely coming back up here with my partner. I got the happy hour deal (a burrito with a can of soda for $12.49). You might think I‚Äôm being dramatic (I love food), but I truly cherished every bite of my al pastor burrito from beginning to end.

FYI, the inside is a little small with limited seating; it‚Äôs bar-style seating with 6 stools.

El trato es amable y los nachos estaban muy ricos: tienes la sensaci√≥n de estar comiendo comida y no Doritos con cosas por encima recien salidas de una lata. Lo √∫nico malo es que tienes que recorrer los cien metros desde el metro al restaurante y es probable que te atraquen en ese trayecto.
Adem√°s es el √∫nico sitio de NY donde puedes no dejar propina sin que te persiga un camarero chino por la calle.

This place is amazing! I‚Äôm shocked there‚Äôs not more reviews raving about it. I started working in the area recently and although there‚Äôs taco spots on every block, I make the 10 minute walk here every day with no problem. The food is amazing, the meat tender and not dry. And the staff is extremely kind and welcoming. The lady makes my food with love every time and I feel at home. Thank you guys so much for your hospitality. Will be coming here forever :)
Delicious fresh mexican food and friendly staff. Quesadillas were amazing. Definitely worth a trip.

Went here with my husband on a whim for lunch. I‚Äôm so glad we chose here. We had been looking for an authentic local Mexican spot to call ours and we finally found it! The woman who was there did it all and was super sweet ü•∞ Everything down to the tortillas are homemade. You definitely feel the love in every bite. I can‚Äôt wait to go back! ü§§

I've been here twice and ordered takeaway. Absolutely amazing burritos and more Mexican food!

I rate 4 for the atmosphere because it's a small place, more like to eat quickly and go, but I love the decorations of the place and the staff is super friendly.
The staff is very kind, the wait is always usually 10-15mins which is pretty good. The food is very good!
Deluciosas quesadilla traditionales. La atencion al cliente  es exelente y la calidad de la comida es muy buena por el precio.
Amazing birria tacos and hamburguer with huitlacoche omg definitely the best
Really delicious food I‚Äôve ordered from here a couple of times, quick service and the prices are fair.

Super tasty and friendly people working here. It‚Äôs for takeaway only and I arrived on a busy night so there were a few orders ahead of me and just one Mama cooking and another person working. But each order seems to be made with love and attention. I will probably order ahead next time and pickup.

My new go-to neighborhood Mexican spot. I‚Äôve ordered through seamless and pick up. They were both prepared quickly. Torta and tacos (fish, cecina, al pastor, and barbacoa) are all much better than the other places nearby.

I have not eaten there so I cannot comment on atmosphere.

Highly recommend trying.

I was lucky to walk in front of this restaurant one day coming back from the nearby post office. It's become my absolute favorite take out/delivery restaurant in East Harlem. I've tried a few options and liked everything better than any other offering in the area. The tortas are my favorite pick. Highly recommended.
